feed.title: Track Awesome D3 Updates Daily
feed.subtitle: A list of D3 libraries, plugins and utilities

entry.title: Awesome D3 Updates on Jan 13, 2023
entry.content:
Charts / Third Party

  • Layer Cake (⭐1.6k) - A graphics framework built on top of Svelte.
  • semiotic (⭐2.4k) - A data visualization framework combining React & D3 [scatter, line, area]

entry.title: Awesome D3 Updates on Jun 22, 2022
entry.content:
Charts

  • britecharts (⭐3.7k) - Client-side reusable charting library [bar, line, donut, sparkline, step]

entry.title: Awesome D3 Updates on Jun 21, 2021
entry.content:
Utils / Third Party

  • d3-interpolate-path (⭐336) - Interpolates paths with different number of points

entry.title: Awesome D3 Updates on Oct 21, 2020
entry.content:
Charts / Third Party

  • reaviz (⭐1.2k) - Data visualization library for React based on D3

entry.content:
Utils / Third Party

  • d3-annotation (⭐756) - Annotation helper with built-in annotation types

entry.title: Awesome D3 Updates on Jun 10, 2020
entry.content:
Charts

  • d3-upset (⭐19) - Functions for plotting an UpSet plot [upset, bar, intersections, venn, relationships]

entry.title: Awesome D3 Updates on Feb 11, 2020
entry.content:
Maps / Third Party

  • d3-geo-scale-bar (⭐45) - Displays automatic scale bars for projected geospatial data.

entry.title: Awesome D3 Updates on Oct 15, 2019
entry.content:
Charts / Third Party

  • v-chart-plugin (⭐197) - Easily bind a chart to the data stored in your Vue.js components.

entry.content:
Charts

  • d3-x3d (⭐114) - Data Driven 3D Charts with D3 and X3D [bubble, bar, surfacearea, scatterplot, area]

  • vega-lite-api (⭐212) - A JavaScript API for Vega-Lite.

entry.content:
Server side / Third Party

  • Kyrix (⭐148) - Interactive pan/zoom Visualizations with automatic server-side scaling support.

  • d3-force-sampled (⭐51) - Super fast, linear-time force-directed graph layouts by Random Vertex Sampling

entry.title: Awesome D3 Updates on Nov 08, 2018
entry.content:
Charts

  • chart-parts (⭐604) - A flexible, React-friendly, Grammar of Graphics for data visualization

entry.title: Awesome D3 Updates on Sep 28, 2018
entry.content:
Charts

  • d3-ez (⭐52) - Easy Reusable D3 Charts & Components [bar, donut, pie, bubble, rose, heatmap]
  • d3-flame-graph (⭐925) - Flame graphs from hierarchical data
  • d3-funnel (⭐333) - A funnel and pyramid chart library
  • d3plus (⭐1.6k) - Extension library for easy creation of visualizations [scatter, stacked, line, bar, pie, network, bubble, box, map]
  • WebCola (⭐2.1k) - Layout for graph visualization and exploration

Utils / Third Party

  • d3-jetpack (⭐614) - Nifty convenience wrappers that speed up your daily work

entry.title: Awesome D3 Updates on Sep 18, 2018
entry.content:
Utils / Third Party

  • d3-voronoi-treemap (⭐214) - Computes a treemap based on a Voronoi tesselation

entry.title: Awesome D3 Updates on Sep 15, 2018
entry.content:
Charts

  • d3-dag (⭐1.5k) - Layout algorithms for visualizing directed acylic graphs

entry.title: Awesome D3 Updates on Aug 06, 2018
entry.content:
Utils / Third Party

  • d3-hsluv (⭐10) - Human-friendly HSL (Hue, Saturation, Lightness) color space.

entry.title: Awesome D3 Updates on Jun 14, 2018
entry.content:
Charts

  • billboard.js (⭐5.9k) - Re-usable chart library [bar, line, area, donut, pie, step, spline]

entry.title: Awesome D3 Updates on Jan 28, 2018
entry.content:
Charts / Third Party

  • ngx-charts (⭐4.3k) - Chart framework for Angular [bar, pie, line, area, polar, stacked, bubble]

entry.title: Awesome D3 Updates on Jan 24, 2018
entry.content:
Maps / Third Party

  • d3-geo-polygon (⭐120) - Clipping and geometric operations for spherical polygons
  • d3-geo-voronoi (⭐250) - Voronoi diagrams and Delaunay triangulation for the sphere
  • d3-inertia (⭐66) - An extension to d3-drag that continues the mouse movement with some inertia

entry.title: Awesome D3 Updates on Jan 23, 2018
entry.content:
Charts

  • d3-gridding (⭐103) - Chart mockups using grids

entry.title: Awesome D3 Updates on Jan 22, 2018
entry.content:
Charts

  • d3fc (⭐1.3k) - A collection of interactive chart components [line, bar, stacked, scatter, candlestick, ohlc]
  • d3panels (⭐27) - Interactive charts with linked brushing [dot, scatter, line, heatmap, histogram]
  • D4 (⭐433) - Re-usable charts DSL [bar, donut, line, scatter, stacked, waterfall]
  • plottable (⭐3k) - Flexible, interactive charts for the web [area, bar, line, pie, scatter, stacked]
  • rickshaw (⭐6.5k) - Toolkit for creating interactive real-time graphs [line, scatter, bar]
  • vizabi (⭐271) - A framework for building visual data exploration tools [bubble, map, line, bar, sankey, donut]

Charts / Third Party

  • react-d3-components (⭐1.6k) - D3 Components [bar, stacked, scatter, line, area, pie]
  • react-d3-library (⭐1.5k) - Library to use D3 in React [area, bar, line, pie, scatter]
  • react-stockcharts (⭐4k) - Highly customizable stock charts [area, line, scatter, bubble, bar, stacked, candlestick]
  • react-vis (⭐8.8k) - A collection of react components to render visualizations [area, bar, heatmap, line, scatter]

Maps / Third Party

  • react-simple-maps (⭐3.2k) - An SVG mapping component library for React, built on top of d3-geo [map, geo]

entry.title: Awesome D3 Updates on Jan 19, 2018
entry.content:
Charts

  • c3 (⭐9.4k) - Reusable chart library [line, spline, step, area, stacked, bar, pie, donut]
  • D3xter (⭐336) - Straight forward plotting [plot, timeline, bar, histogram, pie]
  • nvd3 (⭐7.2k) - Re-usable charts and chart components [box plot, buttlet, candlestick, line, bar, pie, scatter, sparkline]
  • plotly.js (⭐18k) - High level charting library [scatter, line, bar, pie, box plot, histogram, heatmap]
  • taucharts (⭐1.9k) - Charts with a focus on design and flexibility [line, bar, area, stacked]
  • xkcdgraphs (⭐444) - Xkcd style graphs [line]

Charts / Third Party

  • nivo (⭐14k) - Dataviz components for React with isomorphic ability [bar, line, area, bubble, chord, heatmap]
  • victory (⭐11k) - Composable React components for building visualizations [area, bar, candlestick, pie, line, scatter, voronoi]
  • vx (⭐20k) - Visualization components for React [bar, line, scatter, stacked, area, pattern, heatmap, pie, radial, map, geo]

Maps / Third Party

  • leaflet-d3 (⭐268) - Collection of plugins for using D3 with Leaflet [map, geo]
  • Wikimaps-D3js Atlas (⭐47) - CLI to generate raster, topojson and svg maps [map, geo]

entry.title: Awesome D3 Updates on Jan 18, 2018
entry.content:
Charts

  • cubism (⭐4.9k) - Time series visualization
  • d2b (⭐98) - Chart library for axis, pie, sankey, sunburst charts

Maps / Third Party

  • d3-composite-projections (⭐98) - Projections for showing countries' distant lands together
  • d3-topogram (⭐325) - Continuous area cartograms based on TopoJSON
  • maptable (⭐60) - Convert datasets to a set of visual components (Map, Filters, Table)

Utils / Third Party

  • d3-lasso (⭐89) - Tag elements by drawing a line over or around objects
  • d3-nelson-rules (⭐17) - Apply nelsons rules of process control to a set of data
  • d3-tooltip (⭐12) - Arrow shaped tooltip with shadows and dynamic content
  • d3-xray (⭐26) - Bookmarklet that logs results of the data joins as you mouse over
  • textures (⭐6.1k) - SVG patterns for data visualization

Miscellaneous / Third Party

  • d3-force-gravity (⭐22) - Implement gravitational attraction (or force-field-like repulsion)
  • mermaid (⭐81k) - Generation of diagrams and flowcharts from text in a markdown style
  • netvis (⭐17) - Visualize network communication for arbitrary protocols

entry.title: Awesome D3 Updates on Jan 10, 2018
entry.content:
Charts

  • dagre-d3 (⭐2.9k) - Layout directed graphs on the client-side
  • dc.js (⭐7.4k) - For heavy amounts of data

Maps / Third Party

  • d3-exploder (⭐93) - Lets you easily move and resize geographic features
  • d3-geo-projection (⭐1.1k) - Extended geographic projections
  • d3-geomap (⭐132) - Library for creating geographic maps
  • simple-map-d3 (⭐114) - Easy choropleth style maps

Utils / Third Party

  • swoopy-drag (⭐121) - Artisanal label placement for d3 graphics

entry.title: Awesome D3 Updates on Nov 30, 2017
entry.content:
Charts

  • micropolar (⭐125) - A polar chart library
  • mpld3 (⭐2.4k) - Export matplotlib graphics to work in the Browser
  • vega (⭐12k) - A visualization grammar
  • vega-lite (⭐4.9k) - A high-level grammar of interactive graphics

Charts / Third Party

  • recharts (⭐26k) - Re-designed charting library built with React

Maps / Third Party

  • datamaps (⭐3.8k) - Customizable map visualizations in one file

Utils / Third Party

  • d3kit-timeline (⭐379) - Timeline component that labels do not overlap
  • d3-breadcrumbs (⭐5) - Simplifies breadcrumbs usage
  • d3-legend (⭐725) - Legend helper

Miscellaneous / Third Party

  • chess-dataviz (⭐76) - Chess dataviz library
  • codeflower (⭐697) - Bird's eye view of the whole code
  • graph-scroll (⭐515) - Simple scrolling events
